message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $135.  It's a great deal for something worth a lot more to me, but I'm willing to make this a fair offer for us both.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand its worth to you. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $128. This price still reflects the value of the product to me, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
